title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui, the result is unexpected. Selecting xxx as the destination should result in a package 'ui' being copied.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' is not copied to the destination directory xx.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' should be copied to the destination directory xx.
SR:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui
2. Select xxx as the destination
3. Perform the 'copy package' operation
4. Verify that the package 'ui' is copied to the destination directory xx
